subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Rick DiPietro, who did not meet expectations after signing a $67.5 million contract with the Islanders, has struggled in the A.H.L. but is happy to be out of the spotlight.
snippet: Goalie Rick DiPietro, who did not meet expectations after signing a $67.5 million contract with the Islanders, has struggled in the A.H.L. but is happy to be out of the spotlight.
